description: Describes an Amazon Lookout for Vision model packaging job. This operation requires permissions to perform the lookoutvision:DescribeModelPackagingJob operation. For more information, see Using your Amazon Lookout for Vision model on an edge device in the Amazon Lookout for Vision Developer Guide.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project that contains the model packaging job that you want to describe.

parameters.name: JobName
parameters.description: The job name for the model packaging job.

nested_items.name: ModelPackagingDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the model packaging job.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The name of the model packaging job.

nested_items.name: ProjectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project that's associated with a model that's in the model package.

nested_items.name: ModelVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the model used in the model packaging job.

nested_items.name: ModelPackagingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration information used in the model packaging job.

nested_items.name: Greengrass
nested_items.description: Configuration information for the AWS IoT Greengrass component in a model packaging job.

nested_items.name: CompilerOptions
nested_items.description: Additional compiler options for the Greengrass component. Currently, only NVIDIA Graphics Processing Units (GPU) and CPU accelerators are supported. If you specify TargetDevice, don't specify CompilerOptions.

nested_items.name: TargetDevice
nested_items.description: The target device for the model. Currently the only supported value is jetson_xavier. If you specify TargetDevice, you can't specify TargetPlatform.

nested_items.name: TargetPlatform
nested_items.description: The target platform for the model. If you specify TargetPlatform, you can't specify TargetDevice.

nested_items.name: Os
nested_items.description: The target operating system for the model. Linux is the only operating system that is currently supported.

nested_items.name: Arch
nested_items.description: The target architecture for the model. The currently supported architectures are X86_64 (64-bit version of the x86 instruction set) and ARM_64 (ARMv8 64-bit CPU).

nested_items.name: Accelerator
nested_items.description: The target accelerator for the model. Currently, Amazon Lookout for Vision only supports NVIDIA (Nvidia graphics processing unit) and CPU accelerators. If you specify NVIDIA as an accelerator, you must also specify the gpu-code, trt-ver, and cuda-ver compiler options. If you don't specify an accelerator, Lookout for Vision uses the CPU for compilation and we highly recommend that you use the  GreengrassConfiguration$CompilerOptions field. For example, you can use the following compiler options for CPU:
mcpu: CPU micro-architecture. For example, {'mcpu': 'skylake-avx512'}
mattr: CPU flags. For example, {'mattr': ['+neon', '+vfpv4']}

nested_items.name: S3OutputLocation
nested_items.description: An S3 location in which Lookout for Vision stores the component artifacts.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket that contains the training or model packaging job output. If you are training a model, the bucket must in your AWS account. If you use an S3 bucket for a model packaging job, the S3 bucket must be in the same AWS Region and AWS account in which you use AWS IoT Greengrass.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The path of the folder, within the S3 bucket, that contains the output.

nested_items.name: ComponentName
nested_items.description: A name for the AWS IoT Greengrass component.

nested_items.name: ComponentVersion
nested_items.description: A Version for the AWS IoT Greengrass component. If you don't provide a value, a default value of Model Version.0.0 is used.

nested_items.name: ComponentDescription
nested_items.description: A description for the AWS IoT Greengrass component.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A set of tags (key-value pairs) that you want to attach to the AWS IoT Greengrass component.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag that is attached to the specified model.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag that is attached to the specified model.

nested_items.name: ModelPackagingJobDescription
nested_items.description: The description for the model packaging job.

nested_items.name: ModelPackagingMethod
nested_items.description: The AWS service used to package the job. Currently Lookout for Vision can package jobs with AWS IoT Greengrass.

nested_items.name: ModelPackagingOutputDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the output of the model packaging job. For more information, see  DescribeModelPackagingJob.

nested_items.name: Greengrass
nested_items.description: Information about the AWS IoT Greengrass component in a model packaging job.

nested_items.name: ComponentVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

nested_items.name: ComponentName
nested_items.description: The name of the component.

nested_items.name: ComponentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the component.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the model packaging job.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for the model packaging job.

nested_items.name: CreationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp for the time and date that the model packaging job was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp for the time and date that the model packaging job was last updated.
